item.title: 1. Integrated C exercise
item.author: fname.lnameA Tkuleuven.be (Wouter Groeneveld and Jo Vliegen and Robin Marx)
item.description: Download the start project here: c-integrated-start.c. The program represents a book, consisting out of multiple pages, of which each page contains (random) text, represented as a char[]. The following functions are given: printBook() prints all pages of the book (no need to modify this) clearBook() clears pages and frees memory (no need to modify this) createRandomBook() creates a new book consisting out of amount of pages createRandompage() creates a new page with random text main() bootstraps everything.
